Detailed Description

Kernel ANSI C Mask operations performed on a whole image, last updated 8/21/2000.

Note: all methods must be gray tone images with 8 b/p. These functions are part of the Image Processing Library IPL98.

Version:
0.90
Author:
Ivar Balslev ivb@mip.sdu.dk

Function Documentation

bool k_BlurEightConnected3x3 (  TImage *    pImg ) 
 

is a speed optimized blur algorithm replacing each graytone by the simple average of the gray tones of central cell and 8 nearest pixels.

k_BlurEightConnected3x3 operates on TImages with 8 b/p . Edge pixels are calculated using a mirror image of the old edge pixels at the image edges.

Parameters:
pImg  is a pointer to the source-target image.
Returns :
False if *pImg is empty or have dimensions smaller than 4x4 or if *pImg does not have 8 bits per pixel
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

bool k_BlurEightConnected3x3Int (  TIntImage *    pImg ) 
 

Same functionality as k_BlurEightConnected3x3 but works on a TIntImage structure.

bool k_BlurFourConnected3x3 (  TImage *    pImg ) 
 

a speed optimized blur algorithm replacing each graytone by the simple average of the gray tones of central cell and 4 nearest pixels.

k_BlurFourConnected3x3 operates on TImages with 8 b/p. Edge pixels are calculated using a mirror image of the old edge pixels at the image edges.

Parameters:
pImg  is a pointer to the source-target image.
Returns :
False if *pImg is empty or have dimensions smaller than 4x4 or if *pImg does not have 8 bits per pixel
Version:

bool k_ConvolveByteToByte (  TImage *    pImg,
const TFloatImage *    pMask
) 
 

calculates the convolution of *pImg and *pMask.

*pMask is always a float image. No dimension of *pMask should exceed that of *pImg. pImg is considered to be periodically repeated on all directions. Reference cell is (0,0) of *pMask. Apply k_CopyDisplace or k_SetOrigo to pImg in case another reference cell is desired.

Parameters:
pImg  is a pointer to the source-target image of type TImage or TByteImage
pMask  is a pointer to the mask image of type TFloatImage
Returns :
False if *pImg and/or *pMask are empty or if the dimensions of *pMask exceed those of *pImg or if *pImg does not have 8 bits per pixel
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 33 of file kernel_mask_operation.c.

bool k_ConvolveByteToInt (  TImage *    pSource,
const TFloatImage *    pMask,
TIntImage *    pDest
) 
 

calculates the convolution of *pSource and *pMask.

*pMask is always a float image. No dimension of *pMask should exceed that of *pSource. pImg is considered to be periodically repeated on all directions. Reference cell is (0,0) of *pMask. Apply k_CopyDisplace in case another reference cell is desired. The history of *pSource is copied to *pDest, old history in *pDest is deleted.

Parameters:
pSource  is a pointer to the source image of type TImage
pMask  is a pointer to the mask image of type TFloatImage
pDest  is a pointer to the destination image of type TIntImage
Returns :
False if *pSource and/or *pMask are empty or if the dimensions of *pMask exceed those of *pSource or if *pSource does not have 8 bits per pixel
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

bool k_ConvolveFastByteToByte (  TImage *    pImg,
const TFloatImage *    pMask,
float    Prefactor
) 
 

performs a convolutions of *pImg using the TFloatImage pMask.

The (result mod 256) is saved in a byte image. The mask must be a 3x3 image. The prefactor is used for speeding up convolution: If the 8 non-center elemets of the mask are scaled to 0 or 1, then the algorithm is very fast. The reference cell is the center cell. Edge pixels in *pDest are set to the same gray tone as the nearest neighbour non-edge pixel.

Parameters:
pImg  is a pointer to the source-target image of type TImage
pMask  is a pointer to the 3x3 mask image of type TFloatImage
Returns :
False if *pImg is empty or if the dimensions of *pMask is not 3x3 or if *pImg does not have 8 bits per pixel
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 581 of file kernel_mask_operation.c.

References TImage::Bits, TFloatImage::Height, TImage::Height, TImage::History, k_AddFileAndLine, k_AllocImage(), k_AppendTextIPL(), k_CopyImage(), k_CopyText(), k_EmptyImage(), k_EmptyString(), k_InitImage(), k_InitString(), k_IplStartHistoryMacro, k_IplStopHistoryMacro, k_ShowMessage(), k_SprintfString(), TString::pChars, TFloatImage::ppMatrix, TImage::ppMatrix, UINT8, TFloatImage::Width, and TImage::Width.

bool k_ConvolveFastByteToInt (  TImage *    pSource,
const TFloatImage *    pMask,
float    Prefactor,
TIntImage *    pDest
) 
 

performs a convolutions of *pSource using the TFloatImage pMask.

The (result mod 256) is saved in an integer image. The mask must be a 3x3 image. The algorithm is very fast if the 8 non-center elements are 1 or 0. The prefactor can be used for achieving this. The reference cell is the center cell. Edge pixels in *pDest are set to the same gray tone as the nearest neighbour non-edge pixel. The history of *pSource is copied to *pDest, old history in *pDest is deleted.

Parameters:
pSource  is a pointer to source image of type TImage with 8b/p
ameter Prefactor is a common prefactor scaling the image *pDest
Parameters:
pMask  is a pointer to the 3x3 mask image of type TFloatImage
pDest  is a pointer to destination image of type TIntImage
Returns :
False if *pSource is empty or if the dimensions of *pMask is not 3x3 or if *pSource does not have 8 bits per pixel
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 737 of file kernel_mask_operation.c.

bool k_ConvolveFastIntToInt (  TIntImage *    pImg,
const TFloatImage *    pMask,
float    Prefactor
) 
 

performs a convolutions of *pImg using the TFloatImage pMask.

The (result mod 256) is saved in an integer image. The mask must be a 3x3 image. The algorithm is very fast if the 8 non-center elements are 1 or 0. The prefactor can be used for achieving this. The reference cell is the center cell. Edge pixels in *pDest are set to the same gray tone as the nearest neighbour non-edge pixel.

Parameters:
pImg  is a pointer to the source-target image of type TIntImage
pMask  is a pointer to the 3x3 mask image of type TFloatImage
Returns :
False if *pImg is empty or if the dimensions of *pMask is not 3x3
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 894 of file kernel_mask_operation.c.

bool k_ConvolveFloatToFloat (  TFloatImage *    pImg,
const TFloatImage *    pMask
) 
 

calculates the convolution of *pImg and *pMask.

*pMask is always a float image. No dimension of *pMask should exceed that of *pImg. Boundary conditions periodic with width and height of *pImg are assumed. Reference cell is (0,0) of *pMask. Apply kF_CopyDisplace to pImg in case another reference cell is desired.

Parameters:
pImg  is a pointer to the source-target image of type TFloatImage
pMask  is a pointer to the mask image of type TFloatImage
Returns :
False if *pImg and/or *pMask are empty or if the dimensions of *pMask exceed those of *pImg
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 253 of file kernel_mask_operation.c.

bool k_ConvolveIntToInt (  TIntImage *    pImg,
const TFloatImage *    pMask
) 
 

calculates the convolution of *pImg and *pMask.

*pMask is always a float image. No dimension of *pMask should exceed that of *pImg. pImg is considered to be periodically repeated on all directions. Reference cell is (0,0) of *pMask. Apply kI_CopyDisplace to pImg in case another reference cell is desired.

Parameters:
pImg  is a pointer to the source-target image of type TIntImage
pMask  is a pointer to the mask image of type TFloatImage
Returns :
False if *pImg and/or *pMask are empty or if the dimensions of *pMask exceed those of *pImg

bool k_MaxGradientFastByteToByte (  TImage *    pImg,
float    Prefactor
) 
 

calculates the maximum absolute graytone difference of two opposite neighbour pixels over the 4 possible directions.

Diagonal differences have weight 2/3. The (result % 256) is stored. The gray tone of edge pixels are set to zero.

Parameters:
pImg  is a pointer to the source-target image of type TImage with 8 b/p
ameter Prefactor is a common prefactor scaling the image *pDest
Parameters:
pDest  is a pointer to the deYstination image of type TImage
Returns :
False if *pImg is empty or if *pImg does not have 8 bits per pixel
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 1047 of file kernel_mask_operation.c.

References TImage::Bits, TImage::Height, TImage::History, k_AddFileAndLine, k_AllocImage(), k_AppendTextIPL(), k_CopyImage(), k_CopyText(), k_EmptyImage(), k_EmptyString(), k_InitImage(), k_InitString(), k_IplStartHistoryMacro, k_IplStopHistoryMacro, k_Max, k_ShowMessage(), k_SprintfString(), TString::pChars, TImage::ppMatrix, UINT8, and TImage::Width.

bool k_MaxGradientFastByteToInt (  TImage *    pSource,
float    Prefactor,
TIntImage *    pDest
) 
 

calculates the maximum absolute graytone difference of two opposite neighbour pixels over the 4 possible directions.

Diagonal differences have weight 2/3. The result is stored in an integer image. The gray tone of edge pixels are set to zero. The history of *pSource is copied to *pDest, old history in *pDest is deleted.

Parameters:
pImg  is a pointer to the source image of type TImage with 8 b/p
ameter Prefactor is a common prefactor scaling the image *pDest
Parameters:
pDest  is a pointer to the destination image of type TIntImage
Returns :
False if *pSource is empty or if *pSource does not have 8 bits per pixel
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

bool k_MedianFilterDiagonalConnected3x3 (  TImage *    pImg ) 
 

takes the median of the graytone among the 5 pixels forming a cross about each pixel.

Edge pixels are unchanged.

Parameters:
pImg  is a pointer to the source-destination image of type TImage
Returns :
False if *pImg is empty or if *pImg does not have 8 bits per pixel
